testcase.name: Basket checkout with bananas and apples
testcase.system-out: Given the price of a "banana" is 15.0.......................................passed And the price of a "apple" is 10.0..........................................passed When I add 1 "banana" to my basket..........................................passed And I add 1 "apple" to my basket............................................passed Then I should checkout with a total amount of 25.0..........................passed

testcase.name: Basket checkout with bananas and apples 2
testcase.system-out: Given the price of a "banana" is 10.0.......................................passed And the price of a "apple" is 5.0...........................................passed When I add 2 "banana" to my basket..........................................passed And I add 3 "apple" to my basket............................................passed Then I should checkout with a total amount of 35.0..........................passed

testcase.name: Error case -> adding unsuported fruit to a basket
testcase.system-out: Given I add 1 "banana" to my basket.........................................passed When I add 1 "lemon" to my basket...........................................passed Then I should get the message "article not supported".......................passed

testcase.name: Error case -> basket with a negative quantity
testcase.system-out: Given I add 1 "banana" to my basket.........................................passed When I remove 2 "banana" to my basket.......................................passed Then I should get the message "wrong quantity"..............................passed When I remove 1 "apple" to my basket........................................passed Then I should get the message "wrong quantity"..............................passed
